name: Prices Only Members for Woocommerce
author: Dario Curas√¨

sections.description:
Prices Only Members for Woocommerce allows you to view easily and fast prices only for registered users. In addition, you can set the text and the position of the notification message that will be displayed if the user is not registered. In this way, only registered users may purchase on the site. It is based on the WordPress Plugin Boilerplate and it is compatible with Woocommerce 2.1+ and Polylang.

Available Languages

  • English
  • Italiano

If you like the plugin, please give it a rating.

If you have a feature request, let me know, they’re always welcome!
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload prices-only-members-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Woocommerce > Prices Only Members for change the default options
sections.faq:
Can I contribute to the project?

If you want to contribute to the project please contact me (curasi.d87@gmail.com).
This is the GitHub Repository dc-pomfw.
